item.title: The Brave New World of A.I.-Powered Self-Harm Alerts
item.description: New technology alerts schools when students type words related to suicide. But do the timely interventions balance out the false alarms?

item.title: Massacre in Haiti Ordered by Gang Leader Leaves Over 100 Dead, Rights Group Says
item.description: The killings in a Port-au-Prince slum, which appeared to target practitioners of Voodoo, were ordered by a gang leader, a Haitian human rights organiz...

item.title: Daniel Penny Is Acquitted in Death of Jordan Neely on Subway
item.description: Mr. Penny choked Mr. Neely in a minutes-long struggle on the floor of an F train. The case reflected the pathologies of post-pandemic New York.

item.title: What Syria Needs in Order to Rebuild
item.description: U.S. sanctions policy in the country must change.
